name: Precambrian
description: 4,567.3 - 538.8 mya$(br)$(l)The Precambrian Super-eon saw the emergence of life and its evolution into multicellular forms, with a spurt of diversification into weird forms by the Ediacaran period, at its close. At the end of the Ediacaran more recognisable forms of life emerged and these would then dominate life on earth thereafter.
